item.title: LYFT
item.description: score:15 Chances: LYFT seems to be thriving in the growing rideshare market, buoyed by competitive pricing and cost-cutting measures. The company has enlisted Oracle and Nielsen to provide brands more precise insights amid the rollout of richer ad formats. LYFT’s estimated fair value is US$35.
